channel.title: Montezuma County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Montezuma County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-491 North at CO-184
item.description: US-491 North at CO-184 in Montezuma County.

item.title: US-160 West at US-491
item.description: US-160 west at US-491. Merge right for US-491 north. Continue straight for US-491 South/US-160 West. US-491 South joins US-160 West. Use US-160 West/US-491 North for Weigh and Check Station.

item.title: US-160 West at CO-145
item.description: US-160 west at CO-145 North to Dolores, Rico, and Telluride.

item.title: US-160 East at US-491
item.description: US-160 east at US-491. Turn left to continue east on US-160. US-160 joins US-491 east to Cortez.

item.title: US-160 East at US-491
item.description: US-160 east at US-491. Turn right for US-491 south to Shiprock, New Mexico. Turn left for US-491 north and US-160 east to Cortez. US-160 joins US-491 north to Cortez.

item.title: End CO-41 East at US-160
item.description: End CO-41 at US-160. Turn right on US-160 west for 4 Corners, and Teec Nos Pos (Arizona). Turn left for Cortez.

item.title: End CO-41 At US-160
item.description: End CO-41 at US-160 in Montezuma County.

item.title: US-160 East at CO-145 North
item.description: US-160 east at CO-145 north to Dolores, Rico, and Telluride in Cortez.

item.title: US-160 East - Cortez
item.description: US-160 east in Cortez on the connector between US-491 south and US-160 east.

item.title: US-491 South at US-160 East
item.description: US-491 South at US-160 East to Durango.

item.title: US-491 South at US-160
item.description: US-491 south at US-160. Turn left for US-160 east to Durango. Continue ahead for US-160 West/US-491 South. Use US-160 west for Four Corners; use US-491 south for Shiprock, New Mexico. US-160 west joins US-491 southbound to the Four Corners area.

item.title: US-491 South at CO-184
item.description: US-491 south at CO-184 east to Dolores. Continue south on US-491 to Cortez.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching CO-184
item.description: US-491 South approaching CO-184 east.

item.title: CO-145 - Dolores
item.description: CO-145 in Dolores.

item.title: CO-145 - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-145 east of Dolores. Distances to Rico, Stoner, and Telluride.

item.title: CO-84 West at CO-145
item.description: CO-184 west at CO-145 to Delores and Cortez. CO-184 west joins CO-145 south.

item.title: CO-184 West Approaching CO-145
item.description: CO-184 west approaching CO-145 to Delores and Cortez.

item.title: US-160 West at CO-184
item.description: US-160 west at CO-184.

item.title: End CO-184 South at US-160
item.description: End CO-184 south at US-160 east to Durango, and west to Cortez.

item.title: US-160 East - Manco Business Loop
item.description: US-160 east at the western end of the Mancos business loop.

item.title: Mesa Verde Park Road at US-160
item.description: Mesa Verde Park Road at US-160 onramps. Use US-160 east for Durango. Use US-160 west for Cortez.

item.title: US-160 West - Mesa Verde National Park
item.description: US-160 west at Mesa Verde National Park exit.

item.title: US-160 West - Mancos Business Loop
item.description: US-160 west at the Mancos business loop.

item.title: End CO-41 East at US-160
item.description: End CO-41 at US-160 in Montezuma County.

item.title: US-161 West CO-41 to Hovenweep NM
item.description: Sign for Hovenweep Natl. Monument via CO-41 at US-160 junction in Montezuma County.

item.title: US-161 West Near CO-41
item.description: US-160 at CO-41 junction in Montezuma County
